title: please tell me what font this is
content:
if anyone knows which font this is or how to find out please let me know would be greatful. email me at [sam.barney@live.com](mailto:sam.barney@live.com) if you know what font this is

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [valeria\_logobig-old.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822114019/http:/typophile.com/files/valeria_logobig-old.jpg) | 551.02 KB |
author: r8geop

comments.content:
It must be **[PR Viking](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822114019/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=PR%20Viking%2001%20-%20Regular&fid=258608a4e390881294ca58fe69cb6ca9&fsize=60&text=ValeriA&fit=1)** by Peter Rempel (PrFonts, 2007, Free for personal use)

Some letters are taken from the 2nd Alternate font, take a look at the fonts here:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/pr-viking.font?text=ValeriA](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822114019/http:/www.dafont.com/pr-viking.font?text=ValeriA "http://www.dafont.com/pr-viking.font?text=ValeriA")

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822114019/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
